Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6500 CHASE OAKS BOULEVARD,SUITE 100, PLANO, Texas, 75023, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Ribbon Communications Inc provides network solutions primarily to telecommunications, wireless and cable service providers worldwide. It enables service providers and enterprises to modernize their communications networks and provide secure real-time communications solutions to their customers and employees. Its solutions enable its customers with a secure way to connect and leverage multivendor, multiprotocol communications systems and applications across their networks and the cloud, around the world and in a rapidly changing ecosystem of IP-enabled devices such as smartphones and tablets.

value.name: Sam Bucci
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
